title: Living A Focused Life | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Living A Focused Life | Joel Osteen
description:
If we’re not careful, it's easy to waste our time on things that don’t matter in the long run. But if you want to fulfill God’s plan for your life, you have to stay focused. Don’t let the distractions sidetrack you from the good things God has prepared for you.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
